body_html:
I myself have never built with anything below CUDA 9.0, but it should be fine to build with either version.

Make sure /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/libcudnn7_7.0.3.11-1+cuda8.0_ppc64el/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu/include/cudnn.h and /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/libcudnn7_7.0.3.11-1+cuda8.0_ppc64el/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu/lib64/libcudnn.so* exists on your system.

The build looks for the files in CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH/include and CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH/lib64. If CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH is not correct, correct it and try the build again.
